//| echo: false

// ==============================================================================
// API CONFIGURATION
// ==============================================================================

API_BASE = "http://localhost:8000"

// Check API status
apiStatus = await (async () => {
  try {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/health`, {
      method: 'GET',
      signal: AbortSignal.timeout(3000)
    });
    return response.ok ? { status: 'online', message: 'API Connected' } : { status: 'error', message: 'API Error' };
  } catch (error) {
    return { status: 'offline', message: 'API Offline - Start with: python3 dashboards/api.py' };
  }
})()

// Fetch recent runs
recentRuns = await (async () => {
  try {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/api/runs?limit=10`);
    if (!response.ok) return [];
    return await response.json();
  } catch (error) {
    return [];
  }
})()

// Calculate stats
stats = {
  const totalRuns = recentRuns.length;
  const successfulRuns = recentRuns.filter(r => r.status === 'completed' || r.success).length;
  const totalCost = recentRuns.reduce((sum, r) => sum + (r.cost_usd || 0), 0);
  const totalTokens = recentRuns.reduce((sum, r) => sum + (r.tokens_used || 0), 0);
  const successRate = totalRuns > 0 ? (successfulRuns / totalRuns * 100).toFixed(0) : 0;

  return {
    totalRuns,
    successfulRuns,
    successRate,
    totalCost: totalCost.toFixed(3),
    totalTokens: Math.round(totalTokens / 1000)
  };
}
